translation: Man does not reach actionlessness by not performing actions; nor does he attain perfection by mere renunciation.
commentary: 3.4 Not not? of actions of actions? from non-commencement from nonperformance? Naishkarmyam actionlessness? The man is man? Ashnute reaches? Not not? f and? sannyasanaat from renunciation? Eve only? Siddhi perfection? Samadhigachchati attains.Commentary Actionlessness (Naishkarmyam) and perfection (Siddhi) are synonymous. The sage who has attained to perfection or reached the state of actionlessness rests in his own essence
